AI Description: EggNOG-mapper is a tool that allows functional annotation of non-model species using orthology-based methods. It leverages precomputed clusters of orthologous genes from multiple species to predict gene function through orthology transfer.
Core Features: Functional Annotation Of Non-Model Species, Orthology-Based Methods, Gene Function Prediction Through Orthology Transfer
General Tags: Functional Annotation, Orthology, Gene Function Prediction
